Special Notes: Over 100,000 eb is a Priority 3 felony; money laundering is rare

Price/Rate: Based on market value, minus 3–10% transaction fee
Special Notes: Underground barter houses use code phrases, pseudonyms, run by “Traders”; legal and illegal trade both occur

Price/Rate: Gold only (official cash unusable), price set daily by market
Major Export/Import: Any valuable goods (explosives, memory, meat, cybernetics, etc.)
Special Notes: Gold is not legal tender, all purchases are barter in gold; corps sometimes sell in Agoras for speed/profit

Price/Rate: Varies; discount for using in parent corp
Major Export/Import: Company goods, services, some inter-corp trade
Special Notes: Accepted only by parent corp/subsidiaries; inter-corp rate is poor, sometimes accepted by rivals at a loss

Price/Rate: Same face value, but cash is less traceable
Special Notes: Most fixers prefer cash for anonymity, but cash is harder to spend in large amounts without suspicion

Price/Rate: 100–150% of parts cost for skilled labor
Special Notes: Cheap techs are always backlogged; parts rarely proprietary, labor price negotiable
Minor repair, 30% performance lost; see repair tables
Major repair, 60% performance lost; see repair tables
Item ceases function, can cost more than replacement
Annual parts only, does not include labor cost
Surplus intentionally destroyed to manipulate market, some done for corp payoffs

Price/Rate: bulk sale direct to public, avoids corporate markup
Availability: State-run coop (legal), black market also active
Special Notes: State functions as clearinghouse, “everyone knows someone”; barter network thriving
Corp control of land locks out urban poor, creates social tension

Major Export/Import: Weapons, drugs, software, cybernetics, food, body parts, etc.
Special Notes: Corporations dominate supply/distribution, but street-level manufacture growing

Price/Rate: Any price, usually equivalent to street or market price
Special Notes: Custom design takes hours (vs. weeks), best gear is locally made, not always traceable

Price/Rate: Varies (e.g., EchoLocation Goggles: 1500 eb, Kevlar Backpack: price varies, Cybergenics Machine: 2800–4400 eb, EnduroDrink: 8 eb, Pressure Trigger: 15 eb/sq.ft, QuickClot Node: 3000 eb, Sunscreen: 250 eb)
Availability: Legal, black market for some items
Special Notes: See Chromebook 3/4 for extensive sample prices across equipment types
